description: This PHP script handles WiFi spectrum analysis diagnostics, including session management, processing of neighboring WiFi diagnostic results, MAC address translation, and triggering diagnostic tests. It exposes diagnostic data as a JSON response.

methods.name: get_results
methods.description: Fetches neighboring WiFi diagnostic results, processes BSSID MAC addresses, and returns status and data.

methods.name: mac_translate
methods.description: Converts MAC address from 16cfe213c610 format to 16:CF:E2:13:C6:10 format if it does not already contain colons.

methods.name: rearrange_SDTR
methods.description: Rearranges a comma-separated string by inserting a dash after the third element, which is useful for formatting data transfer rates.
